subject: plus x pedal order problem
description_text:

hello,

Josip Kalajzic

Hi Josip Kalajžić,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, but we expect to restock today. We will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fees you paid.

I ordered it as christmas present for my son.

Thank you and wish you all the best.




sri, 17. pro 2025. 08:16 service@simsonn.com

Hi Josip Kalajžić,    Your order was originally scheduled to ship from our German warehouse, but due to shipping delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They will now ship next Monday. We will issue a $30 refund as compensation. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused!

Best regards Josip
